summary: A test suite that validates the UnivNet feature extraction pipeline, covering data loading, batch and single‑sample decoding, consistency between batched and unbatched paths, precision handling, padding behavior, noise generation, model saving/loading, JSON serialization, and overall integration.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of UnivNet’s audio feature extraction components for production deployments, facilitating reliable model usage, maintenance, and downstream audio applications.
